data.description:
A place to hang out and talk about table top gaming! Want to share a funny story or brag about your cool homebrew? Do you need a place to post your latest Warhammer project? Found a funny meme you wanted to share? As long as your post is about table top gaming, this is the place!

Related guilds:

+DND

+Battlemaps

+LFG

+minipainting

data.description:
### What is this?

Hub is the place to talk about whatever you want! Nothing is off topic here. You can do things such as sharing asking questions, sharing images, making a joke, ranting, sharing a meme, sharing any piece of info you want to share, and much more.

---
---

### Rules:  
  
**1, Follow Ruqqus site-wide rules**  

Your content must comply with the [Ruqqus Content Policy](https://ruqqus.com/help/rules).  
 
Violations will be reported to the admins and offenders will be exiled.  

---

**2, No spam**

Flooding this guild with content that doesn't contribute to any discussion or breaks the rules counts as spam.

---

**3, Don't be an asshole**

 - Be nice to your fellow users
 - Don't drag discussion down the Pyramid of Debate.  

![](https://i.imgur.com/6SsqySI.png)

---
---

**Guild banner by @WarMuse**
data.description_html:
What is this?

Hub is the place to talk about whatever you want! Nothing is off topic here. You can do things such as sharing asking questions, sharing images, making a joke, ranting, sharing a meme, sharing any piece of info you want to share, and much more.

Rules:

1, Follow Ruqqus site-wide rules

Your content must comply with the Ruqqus Content Policy.

Violations will be reported to the admins and offenders will be exiled.

2, No spam

Flooding this guild with content that doesn't contribute to any discussion or breaks the rules counts as spam.

3, Don't be an asshole

  • Be nice to your fellow users
  • Don't drag discussion down the Pyramid of Debate.

Guild banner by @WarMuse
